de.erichseifert.gral.plots.points

Class AbstractPointRenderer

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.erichseifert.gral.plots.points.AbstractPointRenderer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    PointRenderer, java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    BoxPlot.BoxWhiskerRenderer, DefaultPointRenderer2D, PiePlot.PieSliceRenderer, RasterPlot.RasterRenderer

    public abstract class AbstractPointRenderer
extends java.lang.Object
implements PointRenderer, java.io.Serializable
    Abstract class implementing functions for the administration of settings.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      AbstractPointRenderer()
      Creates a new AbstractPointRenderer object with default shape and color.
